tool_description: Provides synthetic financial datasets that can be used in the development of algorithmic trading models.
name: Synthetic Financial Data
title: Synthetic Financial Data

api_list.name: Get Financial Time Series - Daily
api_list.description:
Returns synthetic financial time series (Date, Price Return) for the specified symbol. 

Parameters:
asset_class = [equity, bond, commodity, mixed]
symbol = [0000...0999] 
size = [compact, full]  (size = compact returns the most recent 252 data points)
